dict.string: You affect the world by what you browse.
Adolescence is the conjugator of childhood and adulthood.
You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
When sparrows build and the leaves break forth, My old sorrow wakes and cries.
Art is the most beautiful of all lies.
You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
People who know little are usually great talkers, while men who know much say little.
The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings.
A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
We all make choices, but in the end our choices make us.
The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
All wealth is the product of labor.
A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
When the rich wage war, it's the poor who die.
A really strong woman accepts the war she went through and is ennobled by her scars.
Politics is war without bloodshed while war is politics with bloodshed.
In war the heroes always outnumber the soldiers ten to one.
Truth can be stated in a thousand different ways, yet each one can be true.
There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.
Genius might be the ability to say a profound thing in a simple way.
Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
Real nobility is based on scorn, courage, and profound indifference.
A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
As a rule, we find what we look for; we achieve what we get ready for.
Learn to invest in the best quality you can afford and wear pieces in different ways.
You cannot parcel out freedom in pieces because freedom is all or nothing.
Simplicity is the glory of expression.
A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
A smile abroad is often a scowl at home.
We can not play innocents abroad in a world that is not innocent.
No man thinks there is much ado about nothing when the ado is about himself.
Remember that children, marriages, and flower gardens reflect the kind of care they get.
The turning point really is just knowing you're an imbecile.
States are not moral agents, people are, and can impose moral standards on powerful institutions.
Never impose your language on people you wish to reach.
A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
Work on the accent, it will enliven the whole.
If the stars should appear but one night every thousand years how man would marvel and stare.
The chief function of the body is to carry the brain around.
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
Love comes unseen; we only see it go.
Vitality is radiated from exceptional art and architecture.
There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself.
While we are postponing, life speeds by.
I shut my eyes in order to see.
Most human beings are quite likeable if you do not see too much of them.
He who stops being better stops being good.
A quarrel between friends, when made up, adds a new tie to friendship.
You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep spring from coming.
Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so, too.
It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Any truth is better than indefinite doubt.
Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
If you don't think every day is a good day, just try missing one.
A fool can throw a stone in a pond that 100 wise men can not get out.
Of all the music that reached farthest into heaven, it is the beating of a loving heart.
There is much pleasure to be gained from useless knowledge.
The sea hath fish for every man.
There never was a social change in America without angry people at the heart.
The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
Culture is the habit of being pleased with the best and knowing why.
There are few sorrows, however poignant, in which a good income is of no avail.
There must be freedom for all to live, to think, to worship, no book, no avenue must be closed.
Like art and politics, gangsterism is a very important avenue of assimilation into society.
Aviation is proof that given, the will, we have the capacity to achieve the impossible.
The greatest thing in family life is to take a hint when a hint is intended-and not to take a hint when a hint isn't intended.
You're only as good as the people you hire.
Lawyers are men who hire out their words and anger.
We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
Hope in reality is the worst of all evils because it prolongs the torments of man.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.
Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
The slow-motion replay doesn't show how fast the ball was really travelling.
Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall.
Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
Those who cannot understand how to put their thoughts on ice should not enter into the heat of debate.
I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
History is not a burden on the memory but an illumination of the soul.
Existence is a series of footnotes to a vast, obscure, unfinished masterpiece.
You can lull the paying customers as long as they get slapped.
If you wish to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent the universe.
Despite everything, no one can dictate who you are to other people.
IMPORTANT!! THIS ENTRY MUST BE LAST
This quote will not show. Serves as a filler for our shuffle code. MAKE SURE THIS IS THE LAST ENTRY
